extension.name: Exchange Server Edge Transport Performance Monitor

metric.name: Recipients Rejected by Recipient Validation/sec
metric.description: Show the number of recipients rejected by recipient validation per second.

metric.name: Recipients Rejected by Block List/sec
metric.description: Show the number of recipients rejected by block list per second.

metric.name: Messages Filtered by Sender Filter/sec
metric.description: Show the number of messages filtered by the Sender Filter agent per second.

metric.name: DNS queries/sec
metric.description: Shows the number of DNS queries per second performed by the Sender Id agent.

metric.name: Messages Attachment Filtered
metric.description: Shows the number of messages that were blocked, stripped of attachments, or silently deleted (as per configuration) by the attachment filtering agent.

metric.name: Messages Filtered/sec
metric.description: Shows the number of messages per second that the attachment filtering agent blocked, stripped of attachments, or silently deleted. If this rate rises greatly beyond what is “normal” for the Exchange server, it may indicate that the organization is being flooded with malicious e-mail.

metric.name: Messages Deleted
metric.description: Shows the total number of messages that were deleted by Content Filter Agent.

metric.name: Messages Quarantined
metric.description: Shows the total number of messages that were quarantined by Content Filter Agent.

metric.name: Messages Rejected
metric.description: Shows the total number of messages that were rejected by Content Filter Agent.

metric.name: Messages that Bypassed Scanning
metric.description: Shows the total number of messages that bypass scanning.

metric.name: Messages Scanned Per Second
metric.description: Shows the number of messages scanned per second.

metric.name: Messages with SCL 0
metric.description: Shows the total number of messages assigned to SCL 0 level.

metric.name: Messages with SCL 1
metric.description: Shows the total number of messages assigned to SCL 1 level.

metric.name: Messages with SCL 2
metric.description: Shows the total number of messages assigned to SCL 2 level.

metric.name: Messages with SCL 3
metric.description: Shows the total number of messages assigned to SCL 3 level.

metric.name: Messages with SCL 4
metric.description: Shows the total number of messages assigned to SCL 4 level.

metric.name: Messages with SCL 5
metric.description: Shows the total number of messages assigned to SCL 5 level.

metric.name: Messages with SCL 6
metric.description: Shows the total number of messages assigned to SCL 6 level.

metric.name: Messages with SCL 7
metric.description: Shows the total number of messages assigned to SCL 7 level.

metric.name: Messages with SCL 8
metric.description: Shows the total number of messages assigned to SCL 8 level.

metric.name: Messages with SCL 9
metric.description: Shows the total number of messages assigned to SCL 9 level.

metric.name: Block Senders
metric.description: Shows the total number of blocked senders.

metric.name: Edge objects added/sec
metric.description: Shows the rate of Edge objects added per second by EdgeSync.

metric.name: Edge objects deleted/sec
metric.description: Shows the rate of Edge objects deleted per second by EdgeSync.

metric.name: Edge objects updated/sec
metric.description: Shows the rate of Edge objects updated per second by EdgeSync.

metric.name: Scan jobs completed successfully total
metric.description: Shows the total number of scan jobs completed successfully by EdgeSync.

metric.name: Scan jobs failed because could not extend lock total
metric.description: Shows the total number of EdgeSync scan jobs that failed because EdgeSync could not extend its lease of an Edge Transport server.

property.value: Scan jobs failed because could not extend lock total

metric.name: Scan jobs failed because of directory error total
metric.description: Shows the total number of EdgeSync directory errors.

property.value: Scan jobs failed because of directory error total

metric.name: Scan jobs failed because could not lock total
metric.description: My metric description ...

property.value: Scan jobs failed because could not lock total

metric.name: Source objects scanned/sec
metric.description: Shows the rate of Active Directory objects scanned per second by EdgeSync.

metric.name: Target objects scanned/sec
metric.description: Shows the rate of Edge objects scanned per second by EdgeSync.

metric.name: LDAP Searches/sec
metric.description: Shows the rate at which LDAP clients perfom search operations.

metric.name: LDAP Writes/sec
metric.description: Shows the rate at which LDAP clients perform write operations.

metric.name: Messages Evaluated/sec
metric.description: Shows the number of messages the rule has evaluated per second.

metric.name: Message Processed/sec
metric.description: Shows the number of messages the rule has processed per second.

metric.name: LDAP Searches/Sec
metric.description: Shows the number of Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) search requests issued per second.

metric.name: LDAP Read Time
metric.description: Shows the time in milliseconds (ms) to send an LDAP read request to the specified domain controller and receive a response.

metric.name: LDAP Search Time
metric.description: Shows the time (in ms) to send an LDAP search request and receive a response.

metric.name: LDAP Searches timed out per minute
metric.description: Shows the number of LDAP searches that have returned LDAP_Timeout during the last minute.

property.value: LDAP Searches timed out per minute

metric.name: Long running LDAP operations/Min
metric.description: Shows the number of LDAP operations on this domain controller that took longer than the specified threshold per minute.

metric.name: LDAP Read Time
metric.description: Shows the time (in ms) to send an LDAP read request to the specified domain controller and receive a response.

metric.name: LDAP Search Time
metric.description: Shows the time (in ms) to send an LDAP search request and receive a response.

description.value: When monitoring servers running Microsoft Exchange Server with the Edge Transport role installed.
